segments.text: Good morning . What seems to be the problem ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning , doctor . I feel terrible . I ’ Ve god a cold and I have a rash here on my neck . I ’ m not sleeping well either . What do you think the problem could be ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ d say you ’ Ve been working too hard or are under stress for some reason . Have you been taking anything for your cold ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I bought some medicine at the chemist ’ s . I ’ Ve been taking it for three days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . I ’ m going to prescribe something stronger . It will make you feel drowsy , so you certainly should rest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I can afford to take a few days off work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you been working hard recently ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have . I had to get a project finished . It ’ s done now , so I can relax a little .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . Let ’ s take a look at that rash ... it looks worse than it is . I ’ m going to prescribe some ointment for it . If the rash doesn ’ t clear up in a few days , come back and see me . Do you have any other symptoms ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have a bad headache , but ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don ’ t worry about that . It ’ s probably of the stress you ’ Ve been under . Just take some aspirin . Combined with the stronger cough medicine , it will make you feel very tired . You shouldn ’ t work or use any equipment which requires concentration . If I were you , I ’ d just sleep , read a book , or watch TV . Here is your prescription .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks doctor . I ’ ll get these immediately . Goodbye .
segments.speaker: S2
